about_the_game:
A retro action platformer that takes place after the events of Season 1 of "The Legend Of Piss Boy" animated series! Play as Piss Boy or King Krow and make your way through dangerous levels and boss fights! This game IS season 2 of the cartoon! Beat the game as both characters to know everything that happens leading up to season 3!

Disable Steam Controller Input if you want to use the gamepad


Unlike some of the newer games out there, this game embraces the simple controls of the days of old! Both Piss Boy and King Krow can be controlled with a keyboard or gamepad (Playstation or Xbox Controller)! Your choice!

Keyboard Controls:

In Menu:
  • W - Move Selection Up
  • A - Move Selection Left
  • S - Move Selection Down
  • D - Move Selection Right
  • Space - Select Option

Gameplay:
  • W - Jump
  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space - Attack/Shoot
  • F - Special ability (Piss beam with 3 G&Ts or an Atomic CAW with 3 Eggs!)

Gamepad Controls:

In Menu:
  • D-Pad Up - Move Selection Up
  • D-Pad Left - Move Selection Left
  • D-Pad Down - Move Selection Down
  • D-Pad Right - Move Selection Right
  • X or A - Select Option

Gameplay:
  • X or A - Jump
  • D-Pad Left - Move Left
  • D-Pad Right - Move Right
  • Square - Attack/Shoot
  • Circle or B - Special ability (Piss beam with 3 G&Ts or Atomic CAW with 3 Eggs!)

Will you be able to find the Time Wizard . . . in time?
